pkgmetadata.longdescription: Engine======A wrapper library that integrates GeoEngine and MMLab libraries for GeoSpatial ML development.Installation------------.. code:: shell pip install torch torchvision pip install -U openmim mim install "mmengine>=0.6.0" mim install "mmcv>=2.0.0rc4,<2.1.0" mim install "mmdet>=3.0.0rc6,<3.1.0" mim install "mmyolo" mim install "mmsegmentation>=1.0.0" mim install "mmpretrain>=1.0.0rc7" pip install geolibsLicense-------GPLv3Documentation-------------View documentation ``here <https://engine.granular.ai/>``\ \_
